message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item holds immense value for us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. We are currently offering it to you at an exclusive price of $850000. We believe this is an opportunity not to be missed, considering the unparalleled quality and benefits this product offers. Let's discuss how we can make this transaction beneficial for both parties.

I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe it's a great product, but I have to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understanding of its value. In light of your offer, I would like to propose a compromise at a price of $800000. This still represents a significant discount from our initial asking price, while also allowing us to cover our costs and ensure a fair deal. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal.
